title: When you finish your provisionals and get Bronze II....

replies.body: When i first did my provisionals i also got bronze 2. I then proceeded to lose every game from there because i was shit at the game and still am.
You're not alone. I lost all 10 games of my provisionals and got b4.
HAHAHA!!!! That's so unfortunate and hilarious.
i won 5 of them and still got b4.. :(
that's what i got my first season i think. Or bronze 3, It isn't that bad, just remember it isnt the teams you get that keep you there, focus on what you can be doing better.
like when there all 0 12 0 you can not call them nubs
Exactly. Because if you were good it wouldnt be a problem :)

Every single time i have done it i would win 4 and get bronze 3. then the last time that happened i worked my way up to bronze 1, then tried it this season won 5 instead of 4 and got bronze 4... i don't even understand how that works...
That was my placements, got carried in every game I won :')

where you bronze last season because apparently that holds over so even if you win 10/10 you still get placed bronze,,, on another note i heard that if you make a new account and when it sais to choose whether your a beginner or not choose the expert option and when you do placements you will be put higher if you won alot of them compared to someone who won the same amount but clicked on beginner when they created the account... speculation i heard it fromPhreak when watching one of his twitch streams he believes this, it may be true or he may be just jerking our chains
